name: CloudBuilder - a game about learning and creating
name_original: CloudBuilder - a game about learning and creating
description:
• 12 different simple instructions to use and customize, combine them together with your board to create the behaviour of your weavers
  • Up to 4 weavers working together and simultaneously and following their own instructions
  • A simple intuitive way to test your solutions and learn from your errors if you need to
  • Retry completed levels to find a solution which is faster or use less space
  • Easily convert your solutions to plain text so you can show off or cooperate with your friends

CloudBuilder is a WIP programmation game that I started in summer 2017 to learn C++. You can learn more about this project by reading the devblog or checking the source code. You can help me make it better by sharing this game and telling what you like and what you hate, and suggesting any improvement! Thanks for your help!
